item.description: CO2 does not directly tell you how risky a space is for COVID. It requires a little more detail. You first need to know where the risk comes from.

item.title: Limitations of CO2 Monitoring
item.description: CO2 monitoring will be a very important tool to assess ventilation, but we need to know what these tools tell us and don't tell us.

item.title: How Can CO2 Monitoring Help in Schools?
item.description: When humans breathe out, 4-5% is CO2. If you are in a poorly ventilated area, it builds up. Measuring CO2 in a room tells you how much air has already been breathed in.
